rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious, inviting entrance that flows into an open-plan living area combining dining space with bohemian decor.
features: floor-to-ceiling windows on one wall for natural light

rooms.name: Open-plan Kitchen and Dining Area
rooms.description: An integrated kitchen space that is part of the living area, featuring modern appliances, floor-to-ceiling windows, and a dining zone.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (3BHK)
rooms.description: A private, well-appointed bedroom with access to a balcony for open space. Decor incorporates bohemian patterns and textures.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom (3BHK)
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom with bohemian accents and sufficient storage, ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom (3BHK)
rooms.description: A versatile bedroom designed to serve as either an additional guest room or a home office, incorporating bohemian design elements.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated living and sleeping area for domestic help, designed with functional simplicity and privacy.

rooms.name: Utility Area
rooms.description: A multi-purpose area adjoining the kitchen for washing, drying, and storage of utilities.

rooms.name: Balcony/Veranda
rooms.description: A communal open space for relaxation, integrating bohemian garden elements and seating areas.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A welcoming door leading into the entrance hall, designed to align with Vastu's auspicious entry guidelines.

openings.name: Large Windows
openings.description: Multiple floor-to-ceiling windows throughout the living area and bedrooms for natural light and ventilation.

openings.name: Balcony Access Door
openings.description: Doorways connecting the living area to the balcony, enhancing indoor-outdoor integration.

openings.name: Kitchen Window
openings.description: Large window in the kitchen area to ensure ventilation and natural light for cooking spaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (3BHK)
rooms.description: An elevated private bedroom offering scenic views and enhanced natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom (3BHK)
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom with bohemian style and modern amenities.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom (3BHK)
rooms.description: A versatile space that can serve as an additional bedroom or a study, decorated with bohemian flair.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: A compact but comfortable living area for servants with necessary amenities and storage.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-designed bathroom with sufficient space and modern fixtures.

openings.name: Main Staircase Door
openings.description: Entrance to the first floor from the ground floor, ensuring easy vertical circulation.

openings.name: Balcony Door
openings.description: Door leading from the master bedroom to the balcony for fresh air and views.

openings.name: Bathroom Window
openings.description: Window in the bathroom area to ensure ventilation and natural light.
